title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.18 - Violations by a provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.18 - Violations by a provider

State Regulations
A violation of any provision of this Subpart as applied to a specific patient, shall be punishable by a denial of payment of State aid reimbursement to a local health official or a provider or the repayment thereof for tuberculosis health care services for such patient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-1.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
